attributes.action: Provide free childcare for ages 1-2 years old
attributes.additional_details: According to the money advice service the average part time week at a nursery for under 2s in Britain costs around £115 rising to £212 for full time care. That's £5,980 a year and £11,024 respectively.
attributes.background: Mums are struggling to return to work after their maternity leave because of childcare costs. After your maternity leave is up, who's going to look after your child? How will you provide? Help support parents back into work after their maternity leave and provide free childcare for 1-2 year olds.
